name: TeamsQuiz
0:
”Alexa, open teams quiz”
”Alexa, start teams quiz”
”Alexa, launch teams quiz”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: teams quiz
des:
Teams Quiz is an interactive game that challenges your knowledge of sports teams and the cities that they belong to. You have choices from a variety of sports including hockey, baseball, basketball and football. 

The game offers clues through answer choices to help you guess the names of the cities or teams. If you are newbie to sports teams, do not despair - there is plenty of assistance built in.

To start the game simply say "Alexa, launch teams quiz". The game then will ask you to pick a sport of your choice - hockey, baseball, basketball or football. Once you make your choice, it then dives into the teams for that sport. You can ask for help, switch to a different sport or stop the game at any time.

Have fun learning your teams and their cities!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
